COUNSEL 
Rushdhie Habeeb with Shafraz Hamza the
Janak de Silva DSG for the  A.G.

Heard  Counsel 
for 
the 
petitioner 
in 
support 
of 
this
application  and  also  learned  Deputy  Solicitor  General  appearing  for  the

The  petitioner has come  before  this  Court 
seeking a  Writ of

Certiorari  and  Mandamus  with  regard 
to 
the  nominations 
they  have

submitted  to  contest 
2015  General  Election  from 
the  Jaffna  District.

The  petitioner 
alleged  that the  decision  by the 
2 nd  respondent to  reject

their  nominations 
was  made 
in  violation  of 
the  provision  of 
the

Parliamentary  Elections  Act. 
However, 
the 
learned  Deputy  Solicitor
